openAPIV3Schema.description: Hyperparameter is the Schema for the hyperparameters API

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: HyperparameterSpec defines the desired state of Hyperparameter

type.description: The type (Type) of fine-tuning may refer to a specific method or strategy of hyperparameter tuning. Common hyperparameter tuning methods include: 1. SFT

FP16.description: FP16 indicates whether to use 16-bit floating point precision.

PEFT.description: PEFT indicates whether to enable Performance Evaluation and Forecasting Tool.

batchSize.description: BatchSize specifies the size of mini-batches.

epochs.description: Epochs specifies the number of training epochs.

gradAccSteps.description: GradAccSteps specifies the number of gradient accumulation steps.

int4.description: Int4 indicates whether to use 4-bit integer quantization.

int8.description: Int8 indicates whether to use 8-bit integer quantization.

learningRate.description: LearningRate specifies the initial learning rate.

loRA_Alpha.description: LoRA_Alpha represents the alpha parameter for Localized Receptive Attention.

loRA_Dropout.description: LoRA_Dropout specifies the dropout rate for Localized Receptive Attention.

loRA_R.description: LoRA_R represents the radius parameter for Localized Receptive Attention.

scheduler.description: Scheduler specifies the learning rate scheduler.

trainerType.description: TrainerType specifies the type of trainer to use.

warmupRatio.description: WarmupRatio specifies the ratio of warmup steps.

weightDecay.description: WeightDecay specifies the weight decay factor.

status.description: HyperparameterStatus defines the observed state of Hyperparameter

conditions.message: the initial names have been accepted
